--- In nbwrpg@y..., Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> You bet. Our (the council's) goal is to guard against moding, and that mostly happens with new weapons (that's why certain people are being bugged by us more than others). Mostly-storyline things (like reformatting Australia, which doesn't create a superweapon or anything, but creates an interesting area to RP in) are generally good.http://personal.mail.yahoo.com/
